summary: Completed comprehensive testing of QA Projects and Cycles dynamic management feature. All backend API endpoints (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) for /api/qa-projects and /api/cycles working correctly. Frontend Settings page allows adding/editing/deleting projects and cycles. Analysis and Jira Tools pages dynamically load projects from the API.

frontend: Login page loads with Turkish UI (Başlayalım)
Settings page loads with QA Projeleri section
Settings page shows existing projects in table (FraudNG.UITests, TestProject)
New Project dialog has emoji icon selection
Project creation via UI works (TEST_UIProject created)
Cycle creation via UI works (TEST-C999 created)
Analysis page loads projects dynamically from /api/qa-projects
Analysis page shows FraudNG.UITests, TestProject, TEST_UIProject
Jira Tools page loads projects dynamically from /api/qa-projects
Jira Tools API Rerun tab shows all projects

critical_code_review_comments: Backend API endpoints for qa-projects and cycles are well-structured with proper error handling
JSON file-based storage (projects.json, cycles.json) works correctly for persistence
Frontend Settings.jsx correctly loads and manages QA projects and cycles
Analysis.jsx and JiraTools.jsx correctly fetch projects from /api/qa-projects endpoint
All CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) working for both projects and cycles
seed_data_creation: Test projects (TEST_UIProject) and cycles (TEST-C999) created and cleaned up after testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: QA Projects and Cycles dynamic management feature fully tested. Backend APIs at /api/qa-projects and /api/cycles support full CRUD operations. Frontend Settings page allows management, and Analysis/JiraTools pages dynamically load projects. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_qa_projects_cycles.py can be reused for regression testing.

qa_projects_api.details: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/qa-projects endpoints working. Data stored in /app/backend/data/projects.json

cycles_api.details: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/cycles endpoints working. Data stored in /app/backend/data/cycles.json

settings_page_projects.details: Settings page shows QA Projeleri section with table, Yeni Proje button, edit/delete actions

settings_page_cycles.details: Settings page shows Cycle'lar section with table, Yeni Cycle button, delete action

analysis_page_dynamic_projects.details: Analysis page loads projects dynamically from /api/qa-projects via loadProjects() function

jira_tools_dynamic_projects.details: Jira Tools page loads projects dynamically from /api/qa-projects via loadProjects() function

mocked_apis.jira_integration: MOCKED - VPN access not available for testing actual Jira API calls
